SEARCH
Package com.shanebeestudios.skbee.api.region

Class TaskUtils

java.lang.Object
com.shanebeestudios.skbee.api.region.TaskUtils
public class TaskUtils extends Object
Utility class for creating Schedulers

Intialize before use, initialize(Plugin, boolean)

If initialized with `useFoliaSchedulers=true`, will return a FoliaScheduler else will return a SpigotScheduler

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public static void initialize(@NotNull @NotNull Plugin plugin, boolean useFoliaSchedulers)
      Initialize schedulers
      Parameters:
      plugin - Plugin to reference for tasks
      useFoliaSchedulers - Whether to use Paper/Folia schedulers else Bukkit schedulers

    • getPlugin

      public static Plugin getPlugin()
      Get the plugin that these schedulers will use
      Returns:
      Plugin for schedulers

    • getGlobalScheduler

      public static Scheduler<?> getGlobalScheduler()
      Get a global scheduler

      This is used for global World/Server tasks which don't require regions

      If running Spigot or Paper (with Paper schedulers disabled) this will use a normal Bukkit Scheduler

      Returns:
      Global scheduler

    • getRegionalScheduler

      public static Scheduler<?> getRegionalScheduler(Location location)
      Get a regional scheduler based on a location

      This is used for scheduling tasks at a specific location

      If running Spigot or Paper (with Paper schedulers disabled) this will use a normal Bukkit Scheduler

      Parameters:
      location - Location to grab region from
      Returns:
      Region scheduler

    • getEntityScheduler

      public static Scheduler<?> getEntityScheduler(Entity entity)
      Get an entity scheduler

      This is used for scheduling tasks linked to an entity The tasks will move with the entity to whatever region they're in

      If running Spigot or Paper (with Paper schedulers disabled) this will use a normal Bukkit Scheduler

      Parameters:
      entity - Entity to attach scheduler to
      Returns:
      Entity scheduler

    • cancelTasks

      public static void cancelTasks()
      Cancel all currently running tasks
